pages.text: Welcome seekers of unnatural power. Let me introduce you to art of Spiritual Contract! Spiritual contract is a type of magic which depends on immaterial beings called spirits. With this kind of magic practitioners do not cast spells by themselves, but instead they rely on spirits to make miracles for them. It is not really known what spirits are, but it is clear that whatever they are they are

very powerful beings. They are able to produce numerous inexplicable phenomenon like conjuring fire out of nowhere, transforming materials, teleporting and much more. Each one of them seems to specializes on some element or theme. Also activity of spirits varies throughout the day. Each spirit has its on activity cycle during the day and during that time of day spirit becomes much more active.

During that activity time spirits actively watch over the world, so if you want to contact a spirit you need to know when exactly he is active. In order to harness the power of spirits you will also need to understand what is spirits favor. You can think of it as a currency. Each spirit has its own favor, and keeps how much favor you have. If you want to use any spell you acquired from spirit, you will have to spend favor to use it.

Cost of spells varies greatly, and each spell is belongs to one spirit, and consumes his favor on use. You can replenish favor either by trading goods with spirit or by acquiring special contracts. Each spirit has unique set of powers which may benefit user.
